As the founder and CEO of JJ&P, Jennifer and her associates provide strategic marketing counsel and tactical execution to select venture capital and corporate venture capital  firms focused on the technology and healthcare industries. Sample client list: Merck GHIF; Bain Capital Ventures; Menlo Ventures;  Dell Ventures; Goldman Sachs; GSR Ventures; Mayfield Fund; Psilos Group; Scale Venture Partners; SG Cowen; Trident Capital and Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati.
Vice President and Host Marketing Voices

Creator and Producer of Videopodcast called Marketing Voices, a weekly show that describes the impact of social media on marketing. Also drives new partnership relations with advertising and PR firms.

Advised firm as sole marketing executive for 15 years, and became first Marketing Partner in May 2000. Raised four funds during tenure. Assisted CFO and partners on all LP messaging and communications. Invented marketing initiatives now emulated by other venture firms. Created unique positioning, sponsorship opportunities and events for Mayfield. Led strategy for Mayfield's marketing: produced annual marketing plan, created numerous relationship building activities for the portfolio companies, oversaw MF public relations, and all internal and external communications including website. Began first venture blog for Partner, Allen Morgan.

General Manager for Palo Alto office. Grew revenues from $3M to $10M over the course of 5 years. Managed the Apple account from 1984-1989, the largest piece of business for RMI. Managed 100 people in client services.
Attended the Stanford Executive Management program in 1988
Stanford Executive Management Program. Mini MBA program Stanford offers for summer execs.
Stanford Executive Management Program. Mini MBA program Stanford offers for summer execs.

I’ve worked with Jennifer in various capacities for the past 2 years.  She is a consummate experienced professional who has superb knowledge and instincts about the Venture Capital industry.  I most recently worked with Jennifer on a complex Private Placement Memorandum. She has an innate ability to lead a team & keep everyone on the same page.  She’s extremely smart, responsive, detailed oriented and has a “let’s get this done” mind set that’s infectious.   She’s very organized, a good listener and is a pleasure to work with.  I recommend her highly.

March 31, 2014, Wade worked with Jennifer but at different companies

Jennifer is a real pro -- one of the best in the business. As a journalist, I get bombarded with pitches, and I have to brush most of them off. But when it's Jennifer, I *always* take the call. She knows when and how to reach out to journalists, and what we need to get a story done. She has a deep network in Silicon Valley. She's classy and ethical, friendly but firm. In short, you'd be dumb to hire someone less experienced.

summary: Founder of award-winning firm, Jennifer Jones & Partners, a marketing and communications advisory firm for venture capital, corporate venture and private equity. JJ&P invented marketing strategies currently implemented by many top tier venture firms today. Jennifer has more than 25 years of venture capital,technology/healthcare and social media marketing experience including 23 years in a broad range of professional services marketing creating thought leadership and partnership opportunities. Legacy and current clients include: Merck Global Health Innovation Ventures; Bain Capital Ventures; Menlo Ventures; Trident Capital Cybersecurity; Highland Capital Partners; Goldman Sachs; Wilson,Sonsini, Goodrich & Rosati; Dell Ventures; Mayfield Fund, GSR Ventures; Allegis Capital, Trident Capital; Psilos Group and Versant Ventures. Jennifer was the first marketing partner for Mayfield Fund; former Executive Vice President and General Manager of Regis McKenna Inc., a marketing consulting company best known for launching Apple and Intel; Creator/Host of Bay Area’s first technology TV show; called High Tech Visions which ran on Bay Area TV in 1988. Jennifer began her career as a broadcast TV news reporter and producer for CBS news stations in Bay Area, Los Angeles and Salt Lake City.Creator and Host of social media video/podcast called Marketing Voices™ airing currently on ITUNES and ConnectedSocialMedia.com.Past Board member:  IBF-Corporate Venturing and Innovation Conference and Xconomy.Specialties: Branding and Positioning Strategy; Venture Capital Marketing; Social Media/Marketing; Professional Services Marketing Leadership; Media Relations
name: Jennifer Jones
title: Founder and CEO Jennifer Jones & Partners; Smart Marketing for VCs and Corporate Venture
